feed.title: Ariadne Blog
feed.subtitle: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest Ariadne news and events.

entry.title: Ariadne 0.13.0
entry.summary:
Whooosh! ✈️

Ariadne 0.13 is a maintenance release that brings speed improvements and Python 3.9 support of GraphQL core 3.1 to the library!

We've also managed to sneak in some other small improvements to the project.

entry.title: Ariadne 0.12.0
entry.summary:
This one took us a while, but Ariadne 0.12 is now available!

Ariadne 0.12 is a feature release that adds support for custom query validators, adds query cost validator that enables developers to limit maximum complexity of GraphQL query that can be executed by the server, and adds an option for disabling the GraphQL introspection and the GraphQL Playground IDE on servers.

This release also locks required GraphQL core version at 3.0. Support for 3.1 is coming in future version.

Finally, this release also adds extensions support to the Django view, and fixes a reported bug in ScalarType default parse_literal producing an error when GraphQL query contained both literal and query variables.

entry.title: Ariadne 0.11.0
entry.summary:
No joke, today we are releasing Ariadne 0.11!

Ariadne 0.11 is an maintenance release focused on resolving few small but annoying issues reported by the community.

entry.title: Ariadne 0.10.0
entry.summary: We are happy to announce that Ariadne 0.10 is now available, bringing support for Apollo Federation to the library and adding the ability to send queries to the same channel as the subscription via WebSocket.

entry.title: Ariadne 0.9.0
entry.summary: Today we are releasing Ariadne 0.9 which moves from GraphQL-core-next to GraphQL-core v3 as its GraphQL implementation.

entry.title: Ariadne 0.8.0
entry.summary: Ariadne 0.8 release brings improvements to API modularization, makes python-multipart optional dependency, and updates dependencies to latest versions. We have also added Python 3.8 to the list of officially supported Python versions.

entry.title: Ariadne 0.7.0
entry.summary: Ariadne 0.7 brings support for custom schema directives and synchronous extensions.

entry.title: Ariadne 0.6.0
entry.summary: Ariadne 0.6 is now available, bringing bug fixes, extensions and support for application performance monitoring.

entry.title: Ariadne 0.5.0
entry.summary: Just weeks after 0.4 we are now releasing Ariadne 0.5!

entry.title: Ariadne 0.4.0
entry.summary: Ariadne 0.4.0 is now available, and with it bunch of features and improvements for developer experience, and bugfixes!

entry.title: Ariadne 0.3.0
entry.summary: Ariadne 0.3.0 release is focused on further improving the support for GraphQL specification and developer experience.

entry.title: Ariadne 0.2.0
entry.summary: Making Python GraphQL better one release at a time…
